ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 28 Dec 1999, Sh'evil D'Lloth - EA wrote:
> he gives 1/4 to 1/3 a bub of exp if you let him beat
> on you for a little while. The key is using mana and
> losing health to get the good exp.

I'm not sure I follow this. You're saying you get 1/4 to 1/3 of a bubble
if you let him beat on you a bit before you finish him off, but
significantly less if you kill him quickly?

This is the first I've heard of this particular piece of lore, and I'm
quite suspicious. Is it possible that the times you take the hits you
(and your DOTs) do more than 1/2 the damage and the times you kill him
more quickly your pet does more than 1/2?
